title: Why couldn't assassin's creed just be about assassins in the middle ages
body:
Why does it have to have this convoluted story about some mega corporation taking this guy and making him use some future machine thing to relive his ancestor's memories or something?? 

Just have the story be about some guy who is an assassin in 1546 and he's gotta take out some guys. Don't have this stupid ass future machine storyline wtf
